mapper.select: select id, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, subject_difficult, subject_name, settle_user, subject_score, subject_prase, subject_type from subject_info where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into subject_info(CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, subject_difficult, subject_name, settle_user, subject_score, subject_prase, subject_type) values (#{createdBy}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedBy}, #{updatedTime}, #{subjectDifficult}, #{subjectName}, #{settleUser}, #{subjectScore}, #{subjectPrase}, #{subjectType})

insert into subject_info(CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, subject_difficult, subject_name, settle_user, subject_score, subject_prase, subject_type) values
(#{entity.createdBy}, #{entity.createdTime}, #{entity.updatedBy}, #{entity.updatedTime}, #{entity.subjectDifficult}, #{entity.subjectName}, #{entity.settleUser}, #{entity.subjectScore}, #{entity.subjectPrase}, #{entity.subjectType})

insert into subject_info(CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, subject_difficult, subject_name, settle_user, subject_score, subject_prase, subject_type) values
(#{entity.createdBy}, #{entity.createdTime}, #{entity.updatedBy}, #{entity.updatedTime}, #{entity.subjectDifficult}, #{entity.subjectName}, #{entity.settleUser}, #{entity.subjectScore}, #{entity.subjectPrase}, #{entity.subjectType})
on duplicate key update CREATED_BY = values(CREATED_BY), CREATED_TIME = values(CREATED_TIME), UPDATED_BY = values(UPDATED_BY), UPDATED_TIME = values(UPDATED_TIME), subject_difficult = values(subject_difficult), subject_name = values(subject_name), settle_user = values(settle_user), subject_score = values(subject_score), subject_prase = values(subject_prase), subject_type = values(subject_type)
mapper.update:
update subject_info
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy},
CREATED_TIME = #{createdTime},
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy},
UPDATED_TIME = #{updatedTime},
subject_difficult = #{subjectDifficult},
subject_name = #{subjectName},
settle_user = #{settleUser},
subject_score = #{subjectScore},
subject_prase = #{subjectPrase},
subject_type = #{subjectType},
where id = #{id}
